title: My Old Gong Has Amnesia - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Mature   Romance   Smut   Yaoi
tags: Acting   Amnesia   Celebrities   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Genetic Modifications   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Music   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Schemes And Conspiracies   Scientists   Showbiz   Smart Couple   Wealthy Characters
author: Su Jingxian   苏景闲
description:
It is said that when Gong Yue was in a car accident, Ye Shanshan was filming in the deep mountains and forests. Just at that moment, the lollipop in his mouth fell to the ground. Ye Shanshan picked up the lollipop and pondered in silence– my golden backer.. did he collapse? 

When Gong Yue woke up, he found that he lost his memories. Afterwards, he caught sight of a cipher he had left prior to the accident– don’t trust anyone but Ye Shanshan.>
